name: Training Sword
description: A simple sword used for training. Deals minimal damage.

description: An old and rusty dagger. Deals minimal damage.

name: Warrior's Axe
description: A powerful axe wielded by warriors. Increases attack damage by 20.

description: A magical staff used by mages. Increases charged attack damage by 25.

description: A bow crafted by expert archers. Increases attack damage by 25.

description: A holy sword wielded by paladins. Increases attack damage by 30.

description: A deadly blade favored by assassins. Increases critical damage by 25.

description: A dagger enchanted with frost magic. Increases attack damage by 15.

description: A spear wielded by brave warriors. Increases attack damage by 25.

description: A scepter infused with magical energy. Increases charged attack damage by 30.
